metadata.title: CVE-2018-19149 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
Poppler before 0.70.0 has a NULL pointer dereference in_poppler_attachment_new when called frompoppler_annot_file_attachment_get_attachment.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19149` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.3
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.3
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.3
libpoppler-qt4-4 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.3
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.3
libpoppler68 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.3
poppler-utils - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.62.0-2ubuntu2.3').
